1085710.name: Fantasy Grounds - Stone and a Hard Place: The Tombstone Seven (Savage Worlds)
1085710.description:
Stone and a Hard Place: The Tombstone Seven

Big trouble is brewing in Tombstone...and the Tombstone Seven might just save the day!
Designed for Deadlands' Stone and a Hard Place, these pregenerated characters are ready for action and updated with the newest rules introduced for After the Cackler.
As those familiar with our other archetype characters know, each page features one character with art by three-time Hugo award winning artist Cheyenne Wright, background, and statistics-perfect for a convention game or even to help kick off your Stone and a Hard Place campaign! They are:
  • Luke Pitt, Harrowed
  • Carmen Valenzuela, Hexslinger
  • Virginia Ann Earp, Gunslinger
  • Warren Earp, Texas Ranger
  • Ned Harkness, Former Outlaw
  • Matilda Loomis, Shaman
  • Cooper Grannon, Mad Scientist
Grab these heroes before "trouble" comes knocking...
What You Get
  • Seven pre-generated characters, presented as both standard pregens and Savage World archetypes.
  • All seven characters also built as NPCs for inclusion in your campaign.
  • Reference manual with full descriptions and art for each character.
  • Tokens for each character, both full and pog styles.
  • Portraits for each character.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Scott Geeding
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
